Activity: Arrive at the office. Check emails and quickly scan news headlines.
Continue evaluating the shortlisted accounting software options. Request pricing information and schedule trial periods for each.
Work on refining the fund's accounting policies and procedures based on feedback from @comp-1 and @legal-1. Prepare a final version for approval.

Begin setting up the chosen accounting software for the fund. Create accounts for all relevant assets, liabilities, equity, income, and expenses.

Review progress and plan for tomorrow.
